Title: Junior Quality Assurance

Title: Data Analyst Intern
Descriptions: About the job                 This job is sourced from a job board.      Learn more               Job Description : We are looking for a Data analyst to analyse our company’s day-to-day file data procedures. Ultimately, you will help us manage and allocate our resources effectively by providing related reports and creating suitable data management for easy analyzation.Data Analysts also help in basic troubleshooting file data for all the staff and providing basic technical support across the company. If you have advanced skills and knowledge of these activities, we’d like to meet you. Responsibilities Analysing data using statistical techniques and providing reports Developing and implementing databases and data collection systems Acquiring data from primary and secondary sources and maintain data systems Identifying, analysing, and interpreting trends or patterns in complex data sets Working with management to prioritise business and information needs Locating and defining new process improvement opportunities Managing master data, including creation, updates, and deletion. Managing users and user roles. Processing confidential data and information according to guidelines. Helping develop reports and analysis. Managing and designing the reporting environment, including data sources, security, and metadata. Supporting initiatives for data integrity and normalization. Assessing tests and implementing new or upgraded software and assisting with strategic decisions on new systems. Troubleshooting the reporting database environment and reports. Training end-users on new reports and dashboards. Providing technical expertise in data storage structures, data mining, and data cleansing. Requirements A bachelor degree or has background in statistics, mathematics, computer science, engineering, economics, business or other related fields Minimum 1 year work experience as a data analyst or in a related field. Have good analytical skills Ability to analyze existing tools and databases and provide software solution recommendations. Ability to translate business requirements into non-technical, lay terms. Mastering communication and presentation skills Has strong understanding about Google and Microsoft Office Products Demonstrated experience in handling large data sets and relational databases. High-level written and verbal communication skills. Time-management and organisation skills Works well in a team environment and with upper management

Title: Junior IT Operation - Reporting (Surabaya)
